output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, though this appears to be from an official party source (PSD Dolj)
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) - Large estimated audience (100,001-500,000) - Published in Romanian language - Uses metaphorical sports references to appeal to general public
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Uses positive sporting metaphors ("Champions League") - Portrays Ciolacu as a leader and strategist - Clear attempt to build positive association and influence voters - The timing (November 22) is during the presidential campaign period
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly promotional content - No journalistic value or informational content - Pure positive messaging about the candidate
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party advertisement (PSD Dolj) - Paid promotion - Strategic messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses paid advertising channels - Has clear electoral messaging - Comes from an official party source - Timing falls after the propaganda period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook si Instagram (ID postare: 1736664547156289) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul promoveaza candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU intr-o maniera pozitiva, folosind metafore sportive si termeni laudativi ("Lider, strateg, antrenor"), cu un buget de 100-199 RON si o audienta estimata intre 100,001-500,000 persoane. Caracterul electoral al mesajului este evident prin promovarea directa a candidatului si folosirea unor tehnici de marketing politic pentru influentarea votantilor.
